```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
fhi::DashboardInitialiseOpinionated("sykdomspuls",
                                    PACKAGE_DIR=params$package_dir,
                                    FORCE_DEV_PACKAGE_LOAD = params$dev,
                                    SILENT=TRUE)

suppressMessages(library(data.table))
suppressMessages(library(ggplot2))
suppressMessages(library(kableExtra))
suppressMessages(library(fhiplot))
suppressMessages(library(lubridate))
suppressMessages(library(fhidata))
county <- readRDS(fhi::DashboardFolder("results", sprintf("%s/resYearLine_emerg1.RDS", LatestRawID())))
municip <- readRDS(fhi::DashboardFolder("results", sprintf("%s/resYearLineMunicip_emerg1.RDS", LatestRawID())))
county[,age:=factor(age,levels=names(CONFIG$AGES))]

start_date = ymd("2019-01-01")

county_year = county[date >=start_date]
municip_year = municip[date >=start_date]



```

# Epi-curve

```{r echo=FALSE, fig.height=11.69*0.3, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
q <- ggplot(county_year[location=="Norge" & age == "Totalt"]) +
     geom_col(aes(x=date, y=n)) +
     theme_fhi_lines() +
     ylab("") +
     theme_fhi_lines()
q
```

# County Map

```{r echo=FALSE, fig.height=11.69*0.3, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

pd <- fhidata::norway_map_counties

plot_data <- data.table(pd)[county_year[, .(N=sum(n)), by=.(location)], on=.(location_code=location), nomatch=0]

q <- ggplot()
q <- q + geom_polygon(data = plot_data, aes( x = long, y = lat, group = group, fill=N), color="black")
q <- q + theme_void()
q <- q + coord_quickmap() 
q

```

# Muncipalities with the most cases

```{r echo=FALSE, results='asis', paged.print=TRUE }

pop <- fhidata::norway_population_current

pop <- data.table(pop)[, .(pop=sum(pop)), by=.(location_code)]

municip_cases <- municip_year[,  .(N=sum(n)), by=.(location)][pop, on=.(location=location_code), nomatch=0]

municip_cases <- municip_cases[, .(location, N,  incidence = round(N / pop * 1000, 1))][data.table(fhi::NorwayLocations()), on=.(location=municip), nomatch=0]


table <- municip_cases[order(-N), .(municipName, N, incidence)][1:35]
 setnames(table,c(
    "Municipality","Cases","Incidence per 1000 inhabitants")

  )

  k <- knitr::kable(table, "latex",
                      booktabs = T,
                      align = "c",
                      linesep = "")
   print(k)


```
